name: Highlight Blue
desc:
Used as the primary color for elements like CTA Buttons and others that are supposed to aquire the viewers attention.

Place on Off-White backgrounds primarily.

name: Dark Grey
desc:
Dark grey is our primary text and logo color.

In some cases used as background color
example:
Ahh a paragraph of text. The fundamental building block of text communication.

We never use Highlight Blue on Dark Grey

We just use our fabulous Off White color here.
